headline.main: COMMITTEE FORMED TO HELP YUGOSLAVS; Greeks Assist in Organizing Provisional Relief Group Similar to Their Own

lead_paragraph: A provisional committee for Yugoslav Relief, similar to that of the National Greek War Relief Association, was formed yesterday at a luncheon attended by representatives of both nationalities in the Hotel St. Moritz, Fifty-ninth Street and Sixth Avenue.
abstract: Aid to Yugoslavia: provisional relief com formed, N Y C
